thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 16 of 218
thread.title: Kim

author: Kim
title: Kim
text:
Greg was very helpful, knowledgeable, thorough and it was like talking to a friend! I was on the phone for about 30mins but it didn't feel like it since Greg was nice to talk to and he didn't make me uncomfortable or treat me weird, it was a very pleasant experience overall.
*Just want to mention- make sure you have plenty of time when you call as it is a process, there's alot of information so be ready with paper and pen. I had plenty of time since I had the day off so this is more a psa for people unfamiliar with the process as I was.
